title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Knowledge Management Competencies and Strategic Approaches for Enhancing Organizational Learning Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in organizational development or human resource management within corporations, and basic understanding of knowledge management systems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain knowledge exploration (Exploration) and exploitation (Exploitation) strategies to promote organizational learning
Learners can diagnose and enhance organizational learning capabilities by applying a strategic flexibility assessment framework

Through project-based task performance, learners can analyze the impact of Knowledge Management Ability (KMA) and strategic flexibility on organizational performance and compile findings into a report
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
